answers.answer: How ironic...the very substance that we are dependent on turns out to be the cause of our disease.  The good news is that with continued research, there may someday be a vaccine to prevent diabetes in addition to the many other potential cures that are being worked on.  Keep supporting your local JDRF so that this vital  research can continue. I'm hoping for a cure in my lifetime and its looking more and more like we might get there!es
